title_narrative: Enhancing Ukrainian Humanitarian Demining Capacity: support to the creation of an SSTS demining battalion
sector_narrative: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
description_narrative: The project aims to enhance Ukraine's humanitarian demining capacity by supporting the creation of an SSTS demining battalion. This involves training and equipping demining personnel, upgrading training facilities, and providing operational support to demining teams in the field. The project seeks to reduce the threat of explosive hazards in Ukraine, enabling socioeconomic recovery and improving the safety and well-being of the Ukrainian people. UNOPS is implementing this project in partnership with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands.
reporting_org_narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services
participating_org_narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services
